channel.title: Contrastive Methods on Qiongjie's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Contrastive Methods on Qiongjie's Notes

item.title: MoCo: Momentum Contrast for Unsupervised Visual Representation Learning
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: It stabilizes and scales contrastive learning by maintaining a dynamic dictionary with momentum-based updates, becoming a cornerstone for modern SSL methods.

item.title: SimCLR: A Simple Framework for Contrastive Learning of Visual Representations
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: Learn invariant representations by maximizing similarity between augmented views of the same image while contrasting with others.
